basics.name: Rahul Chaudhary
basics.label: Full-Stack Data Scientist
basics.summary: Full-Stack Data Scientist with a strong quantitative background; 10 years of work experience in Core Product, Ads, Retail and Marketing Teams. Possesses Expertise in Causal Inference, Machine Learning, A/B Testing; Skilled in Developing Novel Metrics, Data Engineering and Effective Communication in Collaborative and Independent Environments.

work.name: Airbnb
work.summary: Advanced Analytics for Safety Working Group - Understanding and Fixing Data Gaps for Screenings Products and provide insights into Incremental Improvements for prevention of Crime and Sex Work Activity on Airbnb; Building Internal Dashboards and Pipelines to measure the impact of new Safety Features. Conduct Deep Dives into Safety OKRs metric fluctuations.

work.name: Meta
work.position: Quantitative Researcher / Data Scientist – Ads Research Team
work.summary: Context Adjacency Statistical Research for Brand Safety in Advertising – Executing, Designing and Analyzing Experiment Data from Implicit Association Test/Survey study to understand the impact of adjacent organic content on Brand Safety. First of its kind study released with industry bodies to drive future conversation about brand suitability.

work.name: Amazon Prime Video
work.position: Data Scientist – Prime Video Product Analytics
work.summary: Propensity Modeling – Predicted User Activity Streaming Score - Classification Models to predict user activity and streaming engagement; Productionalized model in pipelines; Adopted as a key dial up metric in product related A/B Tests.

work.name: Kroger
work.summary: Propensity Model Customer Targeting for Retailer’s Promotional Mailers based on different segments and stakeholder requirements; Building and improving statistical models; to reward customers and promote long term loyalty. Generated more than $3 million in uplift, with a redemption rate of 40%.

work.name: Mu Sigma
work.summary: Marketing Analytics for ecommerce website – Dashboarding, Deep Dives, Customer Funnel Analysis and Stakeholder Management.
